attributes.action: include another choice on voting papers to allow voters to voice their dissatisfaction with the political choices on offer by having a choice of "none of the above"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to engage all the voting public in trying to bring reality to the existing political parties where there is little or no choice between them, rather than just abstaining out of apathy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
